DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Punctum Plug Delivery System ( PPDS ) safe effective control intraocular pressure patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Punctum Plug Delivery System Subjects With Open-Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Over 18 yr openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension Subjects bestcorrected visual acuity 20/100 better . Uncontrolled medical condition . Subjects wear contact lens . Subjects require chronic topical artificial tear , lubricant , and/or require chronic topical medication . Subjects history chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease .
